e1.quote: Strength of character can defeat strength in numbers

e3.quote: To seek something is to believe in its possibility

e4.quote: Struggles often begin and end with the truth

e5.quote: Disobedience is a demand for change

e6.quote: He who faces himself, finds himself

e8.quote: When we rescue others, we rescue ourselves

e9.quote: Choose your enemies wisely, as they may be your last hope

e10.quote: Humility is the only defense against humiliation

e11.quote: When all seems hopeless, a true hero gives hope

e12.quote: A soldier's most powerful weapon is courage

e13.quote: You must trust in others or success is impossible

e14.quote: One vision can have many interpretations

e17.quote: Sometimes even the smallest doubt can shake the greatest belief

e19.quote: Never become desperate enough to trust the untrustworthy

e20.quote: Never give up hope, no matter how dark things seem
